unnormalised: Just a note, when providing your business address, make sure to include the full details. For example, instead of just saying "MG Road", specify the building number, like "Shop No. 12, MG Road, Bangalore, 560001". Adding the floor number, e.g., "2nd Floor", and nearby landmark such as "Opposite State Bank of India" helps customers locate you more easily. Always mention your city & PIN code! Don't forget to specify the state if it's needed for shipping.
normalised: Just a note, when providing your business address, make sure to include the full details. For example, instead of just saying "M-G Road", specify the building number, like "Shop Number twelve, M-G Road, Bangalore, five six zero zero zero one". Adding the floor number, for example, "second Floor", and nearby landmark such as "Opposite State Bank of India" helps customers locate you more easily. Always mention your city and P-I-N code! Don't forget to specify the state if it's needed for shipping.
